vsParam: Nelke, um... about the transfer thing, I'm sorry.

Don't say that. There's nothing you can do about it.
After all, I have no idea when I'll go back to my world.

But I'm allowed to drop in on classes...
That's enough for me. Thank you so much.

The alchemy class today is so amazing,
The knowledge taught in class is all new to me—

Really? I'm happy to hear you speak highly of it.
But, you've got some nerve to whisper before the class ends.

B-Bergamot Sensei!
We talked to Nelke in the first place...

Uh, forget it. Let's call it a day. Don't forget to review.
And today's assignment is to gather ingredients.
And the ingredients you need to gather are—

Gathering ingredients... Um, hmm, Bergamot Sensei!
Can I participate in this assignment too?

Er... You are a "drop-in", and it's your first time to be in my class.
I'm glad to see your passion, but it may be too difficult for you?

No problem! The guys have shown me around.
I'm familiar with this place already...

I studied alchemy in my world. I'm confident that
I can handle something like gathering ingredients.

I see... In this case, you are in. But, bear in mind that
I won't be soft-hearted when I mark your work.

Great, Nelke! You can compete with [px],
and see who could gather better ingredients!

That's right! Ho ho, please be merciful,
[px]!

Bergamot Sensei, I'm here to submit my assignment!
Please examine it!

Huff... puff...
Sensei! We are also here to submit our assignment!!

Nelke, [px], and you guys,
calm down first.

I didn't expect any student to submit their assignments
with a smiling face...
I got excited to engage in a competition...
I am 3 times more confident than usual!

This is good. But I want you to keep this enthusiasm
no matter it's a competition or not, OK?

Ho... Looks like competition motivates you. I hope you don't get
carried away with it and forget what the assignment is really about.
Alright, let the results speak. Show me.
Let's start from [px]... Er, you passed.

Keep up the good work and do more gathering.
You are well on track to have a good eye for ingredients.

Next, Nelke... Uh, it's good.
You passed too.

Your work is on a par with [px]'s. I didn't expect you
to accurately distinguish these ingredients.
Does your world also have these ingredients?

No. My world doesn't have these exact ones, but it has ingredients with
similar characteristics for me to take reference from.

Really... It now seems that you weren't bluffing
when you said you studied alchemy.

Thanks! Even if I couldn't use alchemy myself, I can still
make contributions with my knowledge in alchemy...

I firmly believe that, the alchemical knowledge I learned
before and will learn in the future will not be useless!

I see... Looks like you are clear about the significance of
knowledge. I hope that you can maintain this attitude.

Bergamot Sensei!
Yes, I'll work harder!

Phew... [px].
Looks like you have a strong competitor in gathering.
I hope you can work harder too as an alchemy student.

Great~! Not only is Nelke smart, she's also hardworking!
[px], you can't lose out to her!
